attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It might also be an idea to get back some of the money she has gifted to wealthy management consultants and IT consultants.  

The NHS is supposed to be for health provision, and if you don't read the national press, or listen to the national news, you may not have noticed that Patsy has been closing hospitals and sacking doctors and nurses left, right and centre, so that she can make private companies very rich indeed.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
